src_original: naiṣkramyato bhavati adīnacitto  choretva jālaṃ jinacetiyeṣu //  so akṣaṇāni parivarjayitvā
tgt_original: 永不退轉菩提心，　　斯由淨心掃佛塔。

src_original: dharmaṃ virāgaṃ labhe viśuddhaṃ  choretva jālaṃ jinacetiyeṣu //  daurvarṇiyaṃ ca jahe sarvakālaṃ  dauṣprajñiyaṃ ca vijahati so aśeṣaṃ /  viśeṣaprāpto vicarati sarvaloke  choretva jālaṃ jinacetiyeṣu //
tgt_original: 積集廣大勝福惠，　　斯由淨心掃佛塔。

src_original: lābhī ca bhoti śucibhojanānāṃ  vastrāṃ viśiṣṭāṃ labhe suvarṇacitrāṃ /  raṅgopapetāṃ suruciradarśanīyāṃ
tgt_original: 獲得上味諸珍饌，　　殊淨衣服所莊嚴，

src_original: choretva jālaṃ jinacetiyeṣu //  abhyuddharitvāna jinacetiyeṣu  nirmālyaṃ tuṣṭo pramudito vegajāto /
tgt_original: 常覺妙觸適諸根，　　斯由淨心掃佛塔。 若於佛塔生歡喜，　　而能除去諸萎華，

src_original: duḥkhāṃ kharāṃ vācaṃ jugupsamāno  [_Mvu_2.393_] ārāgaye so daśabalasārthavāhaṃ //
tgt_original: 由依十力大導師，　　得離五欲深怨害，

src_original: prāsādiko bhavati viśuddhakāyo  ullokanīyo bahujanapūjito ca /
tgt_original: 形儀挺特世希有，　　眾所樂觀無厭捨，

src_original: na tasya rājā bhave duṣṭacitto  yo cetiye apanayi jīrṇapuṣpaṃ //
tgt_original: 王者常生愛敬心，　　由去萎花於佛塔。

src_original: kumārga tasyāpihitā bhavanti  yo śīlaskandhe sthito bodhisatvo /
tgt_original: 具足菩薩諸戒品，　　滅除一切險惡道，

src_original: abhyuddhareyā jinacetiyeṣu  osire puṣpa purimaṃ milānaṃ //
tgt_original: 意常明了遠癡迷，　　由去萎花於佛塔。

src_original: śokaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca jahe sarvakālaṃ  rāgāṃ ca kāye jahe sarva aśeṣāṃ /
tgt_original: 棄背煩惱諸障染，　　永無病苦相纏縛，

src_original: āśvāsaprāpto so anantakalpāṃ  yo cetiye apanaye jīrṇapuṣpaṃ //
tgt_original: 於一切處獲輕安，　　由去萎花於佛塔。

src_original: alaṃkṛto bhavati viśuddhakāyo  yo cetiye apanaye jīrṇapuṣpaṃ //  paṃca dadeyā śubhadivyapuṣpāṃ
tgt_original: 清淨福惠莊嚴身，　　由去萎花於佛塔。

src_original: māndāravāṃ atha pāṭalāṃ vā [nirmālyāṃ] /  yo jīrṇaṃ puṣpaṃ apanaye cetiyeṣu  vipāku tasya bhavati sa śobhamāno //  na tasya kāye kramati viṣaṃ na śastraṃ  hutāsanaṃ jvalito agniskandho /
tgt_original: 又復持以新妙花，　　或曼陀羅鉢吒羅，

src_original: [_Mvu_2.394_] caurā pi taṃ na prasahanti pāpā  yo jīrṇaṃ puṣpaṃ apanaye cetiyeṣu //  na tasya puṇyaṃ sukaraṃ prakīrtituṃ
tgt_original: 而於佛塔換萎者，　　斯人當獲殊勝報。

src_original: tasyaiva rājño praṇamati sarvaloko  devā nāgā ca manujā mahoragā [ca] /
tgt_original: 諸天龍神摩睺羅，　　王及臣民生信重，

src_original: sarvāṃ sahasrāṃ kusumitalokadhātuṃ  prāśāsi vīro tato īśvaratve //
tgt_original: 譬如妙花開世間，　　而能善說諸法要，

src_original: te sarvapāpeṣu atikramitvā  devamanuṣyeṣu caranti dharmaṃ //
tgt_original: 令眾生離惡趣中，　　增長人天勝義利，

src_original: parivāras tasya bhavati abhedyo  [_Mvu_2.395_] puṇyavanto smṛtivanta prajñavanto /
tgt_original: 福力念惠皆具足，　　眷屬廣多常善順。

src_original: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati sarvaloke  yathābhiprāyaṃ janayati teṣu prītiṃ //
tgt_original: 我說是人於世間，　　隨其意樂心安隱，

src_original: prapūravākyaṃ svarāṅgaṃ bhavati śuddhaṃ  jñāpeti satvān susakhilaślakṣṇavākyo /
tgt_original: 常發柔和寂靜音，　　教諭群生使出離，

src_original: priyavadya dānaṃ tatha arthacaryā  samānārthatā ca bahujanasya /
tgt_original: 能行布施及愛語，　　利行平等亦復然，

src_original: akruṣṭavanto na janeti roṣaṃ
tgt_original: 為他毀訾不生瞋，　　斯由合掌禮佛塔。
